ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: The hard part is finding someone selling :( I sold my Mesh Gloves for 5pp. When I was selling. Almost no one is buying so I eventually decided to sell them to
ygData.messageBody:
The hard part is finding someone selling :(

I sold my Mesh Gloves for 5pp. When I was selling. Almost
no one is buying so I eventually decided to sell them to
a merchant. No one brings woven or mesh back, seemingly,
anymore.

(perhaps on a new server they would

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 10:56 AM

>I wouldn't pay more than 5 p for a pair. You could also get woven
>which cost
>even less.
>
>Draelon
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 1:48 PM
>To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
>
>
>How much should they be? The pair I had I found on an NPC vendor who
>charged me 9 or 10 plat I think.
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>> Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 1:02 PM
>> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
>> Subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
>>
>>
>> No they gave the magic hth attack to us bards as well. I was
>> too high to
>> make use of it at the time, but it should be handy for those
>> who want to do
>> wisps early since mesh gloves are very cheap.
>>
>> Kitasi
>>
>>
>>
>> Err, you're talking like mesh gloves right? I thought only
>> monks could use
>> those as magic attacks and that for the rest of us they were
>> just a light
>> weight glove. Am I wrong?
>>
>> Peace,
>> Evulia, who gave her mesh gloves to her monk not too long ago...
>>
>>
